verses.title: John 3:16
verses.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

verses.title: Psalm 23:1
verses.text: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

verses.title: Philippians 4:13
verses.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

verses.title: Psalm 34:18
verses.text: The LORD is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit.

verses.title: Lamentations 3:22-23
verses.text: The steadfast love of the LORD never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning; great is your faithfulness.

verses.title: Matthew 11:28
verses.text: Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

verses.title: Isaiah 41:10
verses.text: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.title: 1 Thessalonians 5:16-18
verses.text: Rejoice always, pray without ceasing, give thanks in all circumstances; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.

verses.title: James 1:17
verses.text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights with whom there is no variation or shadow due to change.

verses.title: Psalm 46:1
verses.text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

verses.title: Romans 8:28
verses.text: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
